182a1('dul ba): pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tsha ba can du 'gyur ro// des bsam pa/
182a2('dul ba): ci 'babs par bya'am/ mtha' 'khob tu 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des mtha' 'khob tu song ste/ khyim bdag cig rjes 'jug par bya'o// des mngon pa
182a3('dul ba): dad pas de'i phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug ste/ der phyogs dang yul tha dad pa na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag gnas shing de'i gdas ngag gis mang po dag
182a4('dul ba): gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so// des dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur nas/ rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dag gis rim gror/
182a5('dul ba): byas na/ nyams dmas pa nyid du gyur nas/ des lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i phyir dge 'dun la sro khang gyis shig/
182a6('dul ba): de rnams kyis de'i phyir sro khang byas so// bsags pa kun gyis mtha' zad cing / mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur// 'phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral
182a7('dul ba): ba ste// gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin// zhes bya ba yin pas de shi zhing dus la bab nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so//
182a8('dul ba): de lhan cig gnas pa dgra bcom pa zhig gis myakhyen po gang du skyes zhes sems par zhugs nas/ de lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams
182b1('dul ba): me mthong zhing mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kyi nang du rnam par bltas na/ der yang ma mthong ngo // sems can rnams dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du rnam
182b2('dul ba): bar blta bar brtsams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes par mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa// /
182b3('dul ba): mang du thos pa/ chos kyi 'khor bsdad bsdad pa yin na/ des las ci zhig byas na/ de sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes snyam nas/
182b4('dul ba): bsams pas/ ma gsad pa yin par mthong ngo // de mnar med pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang / smras pa/ kye ma sro khang de me re tsha zhes smras
182b5('dul ba): pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i bsrungs mas tho ba blangs te/ mgo la snun nas/ skal char khyod kyi sro khang ga la yod/ 'di ltar 'di sems can dmyal
182b6('dul ba): ba chen po mnar med par skyes pa yin no// zhes smras so// de dge ba'i sems kyis dus la bab nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi sems can nang du skyes
182b7('dul ba): lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skyes te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las
182b8('dul ba): gang gis skyes pa'o// des sems can rnams kyis nang du shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal tshon bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / dge 'dun la sro
183a1('dul ba): khang gi khrus byas pas skyes pa mthong ngo // de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi byed
183a2('dul ba): bdag zhag lon par gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gis tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis/
183a3('dul ba): bdag zhag lon par ma gnas pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro snyam mo// de nas mngon sems can dmyal
183a4('dul ba): ba lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te do shal dang / sen mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta
183a5('dul ba): dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste/ kha dog shin du 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
183a6('dul ba): ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor to// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang
183a7('dul ba): 'di ltar mngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
183a8('dul ba): kyis mngon sems can dmyal ba'i blta'i bu'i bsams pa dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ gang thos nas sems can
183b1('dul ba): dmyal ba lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/ 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
183b2('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos ston par mdzad do// des bden pa
183b3('dul ba): mthong nas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la bas kyang ma bgyis/ mr-i kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnam
183b4('dul ba): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ mngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag
183b5('dul ba): gis tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni sgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/ mtho ris dang zar
183b6('dul ba): ba'i sgo dag ni bye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni gzhag go/ zhes lan gsum ched
183b7('dul ba): du brjod pa ched brjod do// yang smras pa/ khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i// ngan song shul bkab bsod nams rab ldan pa'i// mtho ris 'gro
183b8('dul ba): ba phye zhing bdag gis ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par 'gyur// shin du rnam dag khyod rten bdag gis ni// de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig
184a1('dul ba): thob cing // go 'phang ni bas 'phags pa dges thob ste// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur// 'gro ba lnga
184a2('dul ba): dang mis mchos pa// skye dang rgas dang na 'chi bral ba'o// srid pa stong du mthong ba rab bkon pa// thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis// de nas bdun
184a3('dul ba): byas do shal rab 'phyangs pas// zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas// drag thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te// lha'i 'jig rten mngon phyogs
184a4('dul ba): mkha' la song // de nas mngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu khye spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing ba lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang / dpa'o g.yul las rnam par
184a5('dul ba): rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur gyur te/ cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs
184a6('dul ba): de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo // de'i lhan cig gnas pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brten dgra bcom pa nyid zas kyi gral du 'dug te/ de'i lhan cig gnas pa
184a7('dul ba): gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'grim par byed do// ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas pa brten des chu khar phor du blangs nas/ sor mo'i rtse mos reg na/ shin
184a8('dul ba): du grangs nas des bsams pa/ bdag cag ni chu shin du grang mo 'di lta bu 'thung na/ mkhan po ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rnam par
184b1('dul ba): lta bar brtsams nas mi snang ngo // dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / mi dang / sems can dmyal ba gzhan rnams su yang rnam par bltas na/ de rnams na yang mi snang
184b2('dul ba): na/ lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lhar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong ba
184b3('dul ba): byas te/ lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mthong nas/ 'dzum pa mngon du btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la dang ba thob nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge
184b4('dul ba): 'dun/ kye ma chos kyis legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob
184b5('dul ba): bo// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// mkhan po gcig pa des rangs shing mgu ba dang / mchog tu mgu ba thob nas/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod mkhan
184b6('dul ba): po dus la bab pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs shing mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
184b7('dul ba): re shig khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus ma yin gyis/ dge 'dun gyi nang du dris shig dang / der khyod kyi dri ba'i lan btab pa'i dus la bab par 'gyur ro/
184b8('dul ba): ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gis dge 'dun tshogs shing 'khod pa na/ dge 'dun gnas brtan gyis mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/ tshe dang lnga
185a1('dul ba): pa khyod kyis de'i tshe ci smras/ des smras pa/ khyod la kho bos khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag dge 'dun gyis gnas rten
185a2('dul ba): du gyur to snyam nas/ rangs shing mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam zhes smras so// de skabs dge 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang / de yang
185a3('dul ba): yid rangs shing dge slong rnams kyang / kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyis legs par gsungs pa nyid 'di ltar sdig pa byed
185a4('dul ba): pa log par ltung bar song ba/ de lta bu dag gi yang yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob po zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// 'dul ba bzhi//
185a5('dul ba): bam po bcu gcig pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
185a6('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de/ rigs mnyam pa nas chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/
185a7('dul ba): dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i tshe bu byung nas de dus gzhan zhig na ne'u ltangs
185a8('dul ba): dang lhan cig khyim zhig gis drung du sdod pa na/ khyim de'i steng na bu mo zhig 'dug pa des de'i steng du me tog gi chun po 'phangs pa dang / des bu mo de mthong ba
185b1('dul ba): dang / ne'u lhangs kyis smras pa/ grogs po khyod kyis der brda' ma byas sam/ des smras pa/ des yin te kho bos brda' byas so// des smras pa/ grogs po khyim
185b2('dul ba): 'di na yang ba yin gyis/ ma 'jug shig tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ zhes des nyin thog thag 'phyan du bcug ste/ pha'i gam du khrid nas smras
185b3('dul ba): pa/ yab yum gyi khyed kyi bu 'dis khyim che ge mo zhig tu brda' byas/ kho bos ni nyin thog thag tu bsrungs kyis/ da khyod kyis mtshan mo srungs shig/ khyim de ni
185b4('dul ba): yang ba yin gyis/ 'jug tu ma bzhugs cig/ tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ des smras pa/ bu khyod kyis kho bo la smad pa khyod kyis legs pa
185b5('dul ba): byas so// des khye'u de khyim gyi nang du mal bcas te/ gyo mo gnyis dang chu dang / sa dag bzhag nas/ khyim der bcug ste/ bdag nyid sgor khri bcas te nya'o//
185b6('dul ba): des smras pa/ yab sgo phye shig/ bu ci'i phyir gcer 'gro'o des smras pa/ bu 'di nyid du kho bos gyo mo bzhag gis der gcer zhig/ des yud tsam zhig bsdad
185b7('dul ba): de smras pa/ yab sgo phye shig/ des smras pa/ bu ci'i phyir/ gshang du 'gro ba'o// des smras pa/ bu 'di nyid du kho bos gyo mo dang / chu dang sa bzhag gis 'di nyid
185b8('dul ba): du gshang ba byos shig/ de yang yud tsam zhig bsdad de smras pa/ yab sgo phye shig/ des smras pa/ bu khyod gang du 'gro 'dod pa kho bos mi shes bsam ci/
186a1('dul ba): kho bos sgo dbye bar mi nus so// yab kho bos khyod gsad do// des smras pa/ bu kho bo shi yang bla'i kho bos bu shi ba la blta ni mi
186a2('dul ba): phod do// 'dod pa sten pas sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas/ snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des ral gri shubs nas
186a3('dul ba): phyung ste/ de'i mgo drang ba nas bcad de sa la 'gyel to// nges pa gsad nas song ba dang / sems can sdig pa'i las byas pa 'dar bas/ bu des de la smras pa/
186a4('dul ba): rje'i sras 'di na su yang ma mchis te/ bdag bu mo dang gnyis pas kyis ma snyengs shig/ des bsams pa/ de 'di la smras na dga' bar 'gyuraro snyam nas/ des
186a5('dul ba): smras pa/ bzang mo kho bos khyod kyi phyir pha gsad do// des smras pa/ ci pha 'am 'on te skyed/ pha des smras pa/ skyed pa'o// des bsams pa/ 'di yon
186a6('dul ba): tan mngon par mi shes te/ ba gsad par mi byed pas/ gang gi tshe bdag la khro ba bskyed no/ bdag la gnas skabs ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam nas/
186a7('dul ba): des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag steng gi khang thog tu 'dzegs nas slar mchi ba'i bar du re shig bzhes shig/ de bzhin gyis shig/ de na de steng gi khang thog
186a8('dul ba): tu 'dzegs nas/ chom rkun pa chom rkun pa zhes sgra phyung phyung ngo // de 'jigs shing skrag nas bros te/ rang gi khyim du song nas sgo drung du ral gri bzhag
186b1('dul ba): ste/ chom rkun pa de ni 'di yin te/ kho bos pa gsad nas so bros so// zhes sgra phyung nas/ des pa'i ro de la bkur bsti byas te/ song ngo // sems can sdig pa'i/
186b2('dul ba): las byas pas ni brten pa mi rnyed pas/ mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / dka' thub kyi gnas de dang de dag tu song ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag las ci zhig
186b3('dul ba): byas shing bsags na/ des sdig pa'i las zad par 'gyur/ de na kha cig na re thag pas 'gyegs te shi cig ces zer ro// kha cig na re mar zhags shig ces
186b4('dul ba): zer ro// kha cig na re dug zo shig ces zer ro// kha cig na re chur 'chongs shig ces zer ro// thams cad shi ba'i thabs ston par byed cing / nges par 'byung
186b5('dul ba): ba'i thabs ston pa ni 'ga' yang med do// des dus gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / des de na dge slong zhig gang gis sdig pa'i las byas pa//
186b6('dul ba): dge ba yi ni 'gog byed pa// nyi zla smin nas phyung ba ltar// 'jig rten 'di na de snang 'gyur// zhes kha ton zer ba thos nas/ des bsams pa/ sdig pa'i las
186b7('dul ba): dag par nus kyis/ 'di dag gi nang du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des dge slong gi gam du song ste smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshalo//
186b8('dul ba): des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas nas/ des shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams te/ klag par brtsams pa dang / des klog cing kha ton byed pa na/
187a1('dul ba): sde snod gsum klags shing / sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ rigs pa dang grol ba'i thobs pa can du gyur to// de de la dge slong dag
187a2('dul ba): gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/ des smras pa/ sdig pa'i las zad par bya'o// khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci byas/
187a3('dul ba): pha gsad do// ci pha 'am 'on te skyed pa yin/ des smras pa/ bskyed pa yin no zhes zer ba'i bskabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
187a4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang zag pa gsad pa brnyil bar bos pa yin te/ dge slong dag gang zag pa gsad
187a5('dul ba): pa ni/ chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin te/ dge slong dag khyod kyi gang dag pha gsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las brnyil bar bya'o// 'ga' zhig gi gam
187a6('dul ba): du rab tu byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la phya gsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tsha ba can du 'gyur ro// des bsams
187a7('dul ba): pa/ cing 'babs par bya 'am/ mtha' 'khob tu 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des mtha' 'khob tu song ste/ khyim bdag gcig rjesu 'jug par byas so// des mngon par
187a8('dul ba): dad pas/ de'i phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug ste/ deng phyogs dang yul tha dad pa na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag gnas shing de'i gdab dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid
187b1('dul ba): mngon du byas so// de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur nas/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag gis rim gro byas na/ nyams dmas
187b2('dul ba): pa nyid du gyur nas/ des lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bos phyir dge 'dun gyi sro khang gyis shig/ de rnams kyi phyir sro khang byas so//
187b3('dul ba): bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing // mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur// 'phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste// gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba'o// zhes bya ba yin pas
187b4('dul ba): de shi zhing dus la bab nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// de'i lhan cig gnas pa dgra bcom pa zhig gis bdag gi mkhan po gang du skyes
187b5('dul ba): sems dpa' la zhugs nas/ de rnams kyi nang du rnam par lta bar brtsams na/ ma mthong zhing mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams
187b6('dul ba): na/ der yang ma mthong ngo // sems can dmyal ba'i nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes par mthong nas/
187b7('dul ba): des bsams pa/ mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ mang du thos pa/ chos kyi 'khor bsdud bsdud pa yin na/ des las ci zhig byas na sems can dmyal
187b8('dul ba): ba chen po mnar med par skyes snyam nas/ bsams pa/ pha gsad pa yin par mthong ngo // des mnor med pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang / smras pa/
188a1('dul ba): kye ma khang 'di me re cha zhes smras pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i bsrungs mas tho ba blangs te mgor bsnun nas/ skal chad
188a2('dul ba): khyod la sro khang ga la yod/ 'di ltar 'di ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yin no zhes smras so// de dge ba'i sems kyis dus byas nas/ rgyal chen
188a3('dul ba): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skyes te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa
188a4('dul ba): dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis bskyes pa dang / des sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams
188a5('dul ba): kyi nang du skyes pa dang / dge 'dun la sro khang gi khrus byas pas skyes pa mthong ngo // de nas mngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi
188a6('dul ba): phyir bdag zhag lon par gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis/
188a7('dul ba): bdag zhag lon par ma gnas pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o// de nas mngon sems can dmyal ba
188a8('dul ba): lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor dri ma med pa thogs te/ do shal dang / se mo des rgyan pa'i lus kyis/ lha'i ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / badz+ra
188b1('dul ba): dkar po dag gis thub bkang ste/ kha dog shin du 'das nas/ mtshan mo la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog
188b2('dul ba): gis mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang / 'di ltar mngon sems can dmyal
188b3('dul ba): ba lta bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sems can dmyal ba lta bu'i bsam
188b4('dul ba): ba dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/ gang thos nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lta bus stan de nyid la 'dag pa bzhin du/ 'jig
188b5('dul ba): tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur/ 'phags pa'i
188b6('dul ba): bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do// des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad
188b7('dul ba): pa de lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ mngon gyi pha mes dag gi
188b8('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshegs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag
189a1('dul ba): dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni sgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris thar pa'i
189a2('dul ba): bsgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dag dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dag nas ni bya phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go/ zhes lan gsum ched du
189a3('dul ba): brjod do// yang smras pa/ khyod mthus rab tu drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i// slong shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i// mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag
189a4('dul ba): gis ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur// shin tu rnam dag khyod rten bdag gis ni// di ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing // go 'bang zhi ba'i
189a5('dul ba): 'phags pa dgyes thob ste// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur// 'gro ba lha min lha dang mis mchod pa// skye dang rgas dang na 'chi bral ba'o// /
189a6('dul ba): srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa// thub pa khyod mthong de ring 'bras bu mchis// de nas bdud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas// zhabs la phyag 'tshal
189a7('dul ba): rangs pa skyes gyur nas// dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/ lha'i 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song // de nas mngon sems can dmyal
189a8('dul ba): ba lha'i tshong ba khye spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing ba lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang / dpa'o g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad
189b1('dul ba): las thar pa lta bur gyur te/ cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i lhan
189b2('dul ba): cig gnas pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brten dgra bcom pa zas kyi gral du 'dug ste/ de'i lhan cig gnas pa gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'grim par byed//
189b3('dul ba): ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas pa des chu khar phor du blugs nas/ sor mo'i rtse mos reg na shin du grangs nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag cag ni
189b4('dul ba): shin du grang mo 'di lta bu/ 'thung na/ mkhan po ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na zangs khu bskol ba 'azung ngo snyam nas/ de sems can dmyal
189b5('dul ba): ba chen po mnar med par blta bar brtsams na mi snang ngo // dud 'gro dang yi dgas dang / mi dang sems can dmyal ba gzhan rnamasu yang rnam par bltas na/
189b6('dul ba): de rnams na yang mi sdang ba nas/ lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lhar gyur pas btsa
189b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bya ste/ lha rnams kyi nang du 'dug pa mthong nas/ 'dzum pa mngon du btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob
189b8('dul ba): nas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyis legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa log par ltung bar
190a1('dul ba): song ba de lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// mkhan po gcig pa des de rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu
190a2('dul ba): dga' ba mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis mkhan po dus la bab pas/ bdag ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas/ rangs shing
190a3('dul ba): mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re shig khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus ma yin par dge 'dun gyi nang du dris
190a4('dul ba): shig dang / der khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus la bab par 'gyur ro// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs shing 'khod pa na/ dge 'dun
190a5('dul ba): gyi gnas brten gyi mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i tshe ci smras/ des smras pa/ khyod la kho bos khyod mkhan po dus la bab
190a6('dul ba): bas/ bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur snyam nas/ rangs shing mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/ zhes smras so// des skabs de dge
190a7('dul ba): 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang / de yang yid rangs shing / dge slong rnams kyang kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma chos/ kye ma dge 'dun/ kye ma chos kyi
190a8('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa nyid/ 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa logs par ltung bar song bar de lta bu dag gis kyang / yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob bo zhes ched
190b1('dul ba): du brjod pa ched du brjod do// // sdom la// dgra bcom gsad dang dge 'dun dben// ngan sems kyis ni khrag phyung dang // pham par gyur
190b2('dul ba): pa bzhi pa dang // gnas nas dbyung ba gsum yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
190b3('dul ba): ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ljang brang gi tshal bseb du ma ga da'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga ta'i praM ze/
190b4('dul ba): dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lhan cig bden pa dag bkod pa na/ des rang gi yul du dril sgrags par byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du sus
190b5('dul ba): kyang chom rkun mi bya'o// gang byed pa ni ngas de yul med par byas shing sbyin pa ni nga nyid kyi marjod dang / bang ba nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo'o// gang gi tshe
190b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi ko sa la'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo sdes brtul ba de'i tshe na des kyang dril sgrags pa byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du sus kyang
190b7('dul ba): chom rkun mi bya'o// zhes bsgo'o// gang zhig byed na de gsad pa'i gyod la sgrim cing / sbyin pa ni nga nyid kyi bang mdzod dang / bang ba nas sbyin pa'o zhes bsgo
190b8('dul ba): ba dang / de nas yul ma ga ta'i chom rkun pa gang yin pa dang / yul ko sa'i chom rgan pa gang yin pa de dag sa khams kyi bar du song ste 'khod nas/ yul ma
191a1('dul ba): ga ta nas don 'thun 'ong ba gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byed do// yul ko sa la nas don 'thun 'ong ba gang yin pa
191a2('dul ba): de dag kyang 'joms par byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ don 'thun pa sel ba dang bcas pa yul ma ga ta nas/ yul ko sa lar 'phags pa dang /
191a3('dul ba): gang gi tshe sa 'tshams kyi bar du phyin pa de'i tshe/ ded dpon des smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni gdugs pa gnon pa yin pas/ bdag
191a4('dul ba): cag la sbyin pa sbyin du 'jug nus pa yin na/ bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsel ba la bla sbyin par bya/ 'di dag 'di nyid nas phyir zlog gi/ zhes de dag phyir
191a5('dul ba): zlog te/ don 'thun te tshegs nyung ngur chas pa dang / chom rkun pa de dag gis kyang bya ma rta bcug ste bsdad pa dang / des de mthong nas shes ldan dag don
191a6('dul ba): 'thun tshogs nyung ngus 'ong na/ ci'i phyir btang snyomasu 'khod nas smras pa dang / de nas chom rkun pa de dag gis der tsheng ba kha cig ni srog dang phral lo//
191a7('dul ba): kha cig ni zong bor te bros so// dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang / mthong ba mi 'jug pas/ dgra bcom pa don 'thun de dang 'grogs pa
191a8('dul ba): zhig kyang srog dang phral lo// de na don 'thun gang dag bros pa de dag mgo dang lus rdul gyis g.yogs te klad pa'i skra yogs nas/ ku co 'don cing ko sa
191b1('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du phyin nas/ thal mo sbyar te smras pa/ lha khyod kyi yul du bdag cag tsheng par mi rung bar rnam par bzhag go ci zhig/ bdag cag
191b2('dul ba): chom rkun dag gis bcom mo// phyogs gang du ga ge mo zhig tu'o// rgyal pos dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba// kun rdzas dang chom rkun pa dag myur du khrugs
191b3('dul ba): shig/ des dpung gis tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas/ phyir byung ba dang / chom rkun de dag kyang go cha phud nas bag yangasu ko sa la'i dgon pa zhig tu
191b4('dul ba): kun rdzas 'ged cing 'khod pa las/ dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos de dag phyogs bzhir bskor nas/ dbus su dang dang rnga pa rta ha'i sgra dag gis skrag
191b5('dul ba): par byas pa dang / de rnams las kha cig ni kun rdzas bor te bros so// kha cig ni gsad do// drug bcu la ni gson por bzung ste/ des kun rdzas de yang
191b6('dul ba): khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha chom rkun pa dag ni 'di dag lagaso// kun rdzas ni 'di dag lags so// de nas rgyal pos de rnams la smras
191b7('dul ba): ba/ shes ldan dag khyod kyis rgyal pos dril sgrags pa byed du bcug ste/ nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun ma mi bya'o// gal te byed na de gsad pa'i/
191b8('dul ba): gyod las sbyin cing / sbyin pa ni nga nyid kyis mdzod dang / bang ba nas sbyin no zhes ma thos so// de dag gis smras pa/ lha thos so// 'o na ci'i phyir tshed
192a1('dul ba): dag bcom/ lha mtsho ba ma mchis so// ci'i phyir srog dang bral/ 'jigs pa nye bar bstan pa'i slad du'o// khyed kyis 'jigs
192a2('dul ba): pa de 'dra ba nye bar bstan pa dang / da mngon sus kyang ma mthong ba gang yin pa'i 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nye bar bstan par bya'o// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams
192a3('dul ba): la rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la 'di dag thams cad sod cig/ de dag gis lam po che dang / srad dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo
192a4('dul ba): rnamasu rjesu sgrogs shing gsad par khrid pa na/ chom rkun pa zhig lamadog par bros te/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du dge slong gi gam du song ste smras pa/ 'phags
192a5('dul ba): ba bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshalo// des rab tu byung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas so// chom rkun pa de dag kyang gsad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
192a6('dul ba): dag rang gi rgud pa dang / gzhan gyi rgud pa dang / rang gi 'byor pa dang / gzhan gyis 'byor pad+ma yang dang yang du so sor rtogs shig/ de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge
192a7('dul ba): srong dag rang gi rgud pa dang / gzhan gyi rgud pa ni kun du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin la/ rang gi 'byor pa dang / gzhan gyi 'byor pa yang kun du skyo bar 'gyur
192a8('dul ba): ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro// zhes gsungs pas/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rnams kyis smras dur khrod rgyur 'dong ba na/ dge slong de yang de rnams dang
192b1('dul ba): lhan cig tu dur khrod rgyur 'dod pa las/ des chom rkun pa de dag gsad par mthong nas/ mchi mas brnangs te 'dug par gyur pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis
192b2('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di bsar du rab tu byung ba yin kyang / bsam pa 'di 'dri bar bzang ngo // des skad phyung ste du bar brtsams pa dang / dge slong
192b3('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir cho nges 'debs/ des bsams pa/ 'di ni bdag gi pha'o// 'di ni bdag gi phu nu'o// 'di ni bdag gis khu
192b4('dul ba): bo'o// 'di ni zhing po'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di rnams kyis dgra bcom pa srog dang phral laM/ des smras pa/ phral lo// zhes zer ba'i skabs de btso
192b5('dul ba): ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom
192b6('dul ba): pa gsad pa yin te/ gang zag dgra bcom pa gsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/ dge slong dag khyod kyis gang zag dgra btso
192b7('dul ba): pa gsad pa chos 'di las snyil bar bya'o// 'ga' zhig gi gam du rab tu byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs nas/ des de la dgra bcom pa gsad pa ma yin nam zhes
192b8('dul ba): dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed na 'gal tsha ba can du 'gyur ro// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
193a1('dul ba): ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gang gis mngon rab tu phyung ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
193a2('dul ba): phye ba de/ gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos por 'tshal na/ rab tu byung bar
193a3('dul ba): bgyi 'am/ rab tu byung bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o// de lta na 'ga' zhig gi gam du rab tu byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la dge
193a4('dul ba): 'dun gyi dben byas pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tsha ba can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
193a5('dul ba): ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi khrag byung ba/ gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
193a6('dul ba): ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos por 'tshal na/ rab tu byung bar bgyi 'am/ rab tu byung bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor rab
193a7('dul ba): rab tu byung bar mi bya'o// de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gam du rab tu byung 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi khrag phyung
193a8('dul ba): ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshab can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
193b1('dul ba): pa 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sngon rab tu byung ba dang / pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba de/ gal te legs par
193b2('dul ba): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos por 'tshal na/ rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/ rab tu dbyung bar
193b3('dul ba): mi bgyi/ nye ba 'khor dbyung bar mi bya'o// de lta bas na 'gal tsha ba can zhig gis gam du 'byung 'dod pa 'ongs na/ des de la pham par 'gyur ba'i bzhi
193b4('dul ba): las ltung ba gang yang rung ba byung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o// ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tsha ba can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
193b5('dul ba): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
193b6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te gang zag ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba babs pa zhig phyir 'ongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba mthong gis
193b7('dul ba): bdag rab tu byung bar gsol zhes zer na/ rab tu byung bar bya'o// rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba bshags par byas/ bdag bsnyen pa
193b8('dul ba): rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ zhes zer na/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya'o// ci ste bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ltung ba mthong zhes zer na/ gal te dge 'dun
194a1('dul ba): tshogs pa yod na yang ma mthong bas gnas dbyung bar bya'o// gal te tshogs pa med na ji snyed bsnyen pa rdzogs na legs
194a2('dul ba): par bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yin te/ 'di ltar gang zag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs par dge slong
194a3('dul ba): gi dngos po rnyed par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pas/ gnas nas byung ba dang / sdig
194a4('dul ba): pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas phyung ba yang de bzhin no// sdom la// / lag rdum dag dang rkang rdum dang / lag
194a5('dul ba): sor zlum po 'dzes pa dang // mchu med lus la rma mtshan can// rgan ches pa dang bzhon ches dang // theng po spang mtshal zhar ba dang // lag sor rdum skur
194a6('dul ba): me thung dang / lba ba lkugs pa 'on pa dang // rten bye dang ni rkang 'bam dang // bud med kyis dub khur gyis dub// mi gang lam gyis dub rnams dang // ye zam
194a7('dul ba): lugs te gam dang // de lta bu'i mi rnams kyis// drang srong chen pos dgag pa mdzad// mdzes pa rab tu byung ba dang // yongasu dag pa bsnyen pa rdzogs par/
194a8('dul ba): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te// bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal
194b1('dul ba): mgon med zos sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde dag gis kun du spyod pa ni/ gang rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas pa des ji
194b2('dul ba): srid du 'di dag gis ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag yin no// zhes bya bar mi shes pa de srid du de de dag lhan cig gnas par byed la/ gal gi tshe shes par
194b3('dul ba): gyur pa de'i tshe/ dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa dang lhan cig gnas par byed do// ston pa'i bka' lung gis dus gsum du 'gro ba'i phyir lta ba 'ba' shig
194b4('dul ba): byed do// de nas de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa/ dga'o nyer dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di btsan 'phrog ma dang 'dra ste/ bdag cag gis rab tu phyung
194b5('dul ba): ba rnams 'di dag gis 'phrog par byed kyis/ da ni lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis dbrog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de 'dra bar rab tu byung bar bya'o zhes gros
194b6('dul ba): byaso// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ni kun du khyam pas mi lag rdum zhig mthong nas smras pa/ gzhin bzangs ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung / des smras pa/ 'phag
194b7('dul ba): pa bdag lag pa ma tshang ba su zhig gis rab tu 'byin par byed/ nye dgas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa thugs rjes rab tu phye ba
194b8('dul ba): yin gyis/ kho bos khyod rab tu byung bar bya'o zhes des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed so// de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum zhig kun du spyod
195a1('dul ba): ba'i chos rnams la bslabs nas smras pa/ gzhin bzangs ri dgas mi sos/ mnyan yod na rgya che la rang gi spyod yul dang / yab
195a2('dul ba): kyi spyod yul yin pas bsod snyoms rgyus la 'tsho bar gyis shig/ des smras pa/ mkhan po ji ltar bsod snyoms rgyu bar bgyi/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis de
195a3('dul ba): tsam yang mi shes saM/ ngas khyod la bstan par bya'o// zhes des de'i sham thabs srad bus bcings/ chos gos ni tsher mas gtur te bskon/ dpung pa g.yon par ni
195a4('dul ba): lhung bzed kyi snod bzhag/ dpung pa g.yas par ni mkhar bsil bzhag ste/ de nas mnyan yod du spyod yul du zhugs pa dang / bud med kyis brang
195a5('dul ba): brdungs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sus khyod rab tu byung ba'i lag pa gnyis bcad/ des smras pa/ sring mo khyim pa nas kho bo'i lag pa chad/ de rab tu
195a6('dul ba): phyung nas chad pa ni ma yin no// sus rab tu phyung / des smras pa/ mkhan po nye dgas so// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa des ma rtogs
195a7('dul ba): par gzhan su zhig 'di lta bu rab tu 'byin par byed ces zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
195a8('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag lag rdum rab tu 'byin pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas bka' stsal ba/ dge slong
195b1('dul ba): ngag de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lag rdum rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par mi bya'o// rab tu 'byin par byed/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed

195b3('dul ba): dang / rgan ches pa dag kyang de bzhin no// dge slong dag gzhon ches pa dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas/ de dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal gshang lci ma

195b6('dul ba): lba ba can dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa dang / rten phye ba dang / rkang 'bam dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta
195b7('dul ba): bu dag kyang rab tu byung bar mi bya'o// rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal chab can du 'gyur ro// dge slong dag bud med kyis drab pa dang / khur gyis drab pa dang /

196a1('dul ba): bar mi bya'o// rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshab can du 'gyuraro// bsdu bar bya ba'i skabs so// rab tu byung ba'i gzhi rdzog so//
196a2('dul ba): / gso sbyong bzhi'i spyi sdom la// mu stegs can dang ka bi na// gnas dang rgyal po sbyar ba mang // sdom la// mu stegs can dang gsol
196a3('dul ba): ba dang // gnang ba dang ni gdugs pa dang // bab col spong dang zhal ta dang // bya dang dge sbyong gnas rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i

196a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong pa sngas kyis/ bdag cag mu stegs can kun du rgyus dag gi kun dga' ra ba ga la bder
196a8('dul ba): 'dong ngo // de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gis dga' ro ba ga la ba der dong ste/ byin nas gzhan
196b1('dul ba): mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag dang / lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/

197a1('dul ba): kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag la yang mchis pa dang / bgyi ba dang gso sbyong bya bar gsol/

197b1('dul ba): pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/ lus la skra dang kha spu dang / so dang sen mo dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / lpags pa dang / sha dang rus

198a6('dul ba): dang / stag rnams dang / gung rnams dang / gzigs rnams kyis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / btso
198a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgon par rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o// de dag grong dang nye bar lhags nas bsgom par byed pa na/ ma dad pa rnams 'phags
198a8('dul ba): pa dag ci khyed cag 'ga' shig shi ba dang / ldan par ma gyur tam zhes tso 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
198b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ phyogs de yal ga dag gam/ seg ma dag gam/ re lde dag gis skor bar bya'o// de dag gis phyogs de la yal ga
198b2('dul ba): dag gam/ seg ma dag gam/ re lde dag dag gis skor ba dang / ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di rgyal po ga gon gyi ra ba 'am/ la phug gi ra ba 'am zhes co 'dri
198b3('dul ba): ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/ 'obs dag
198b4('dul ba): gis bskor bar bya'o// ma dag pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di ma du lung ga'i ra ba 'am/ 'on te bal po se ba'i ra ba yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ rnal 'byor
198b5('dul ba): bsgom pa'o// zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na spong khang rtsig
198b6('dul ba): par gnang ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis spong khang rtsig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis spong khang rnam pa ji lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan
198b7('dul ba): 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spong khang ni gnyis te chung ngu dang chen po'o// chung ngu ni gnas khang gnyis kyis
198b8('dul ba): bar du srang gtod pa'o// chen po ni gnas bcu sum 'am bcu gnyis kyis bar du srang gtod pa'o// dge slong dog gis gnas khas byas nas sbyang ba bzhin du sgo 'dod par mi
199a1('dul ba): byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo 'dod par bya'o// dge slong dag gis sgo glegs ma mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
199a2('dul ba): stsal pa/ sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o// dbye dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung gtod par bya'o// dma' bar gtod pa na/ chom rkun pa dang / g.yon
199a3('dul ba): can dang / seng ge dang / glang rnams kyis bgrod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dma' bar gtod par mi bya'o// mthon por gtod pa ni snang ba mi gsal
199a4('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthon por gtod par mi bya bar/ sum gnyis dor bar bya zhing / sum char gtod par bya'o// de dag gong du sum gnyis bor te/ 'og
199a5('dul ba): gi sum char gtod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu sum gnyis bor te steng gi sum cha bor bar gtod bya'o// dge slong dag phyi yangs shing nang rub par
199a6('dul ba): byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ skar khung rgya mtsho'i rnam par gtong bar bya ste/ phyi rub la nang yangs par bya'o// khwa dang mchil ba dang / phug ron dag
199a7('dul ba): 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar khung dra ba can du bya'o// sbram bu tre ma bu ka dang / tre la ta dag 'jug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
199a8('dul ba): pa/ sgo glegs bzhug par bya'o// rlung gis 'byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ phred gtan bzhug par bya'o// bcad dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
199b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ gnam gzer dang 'khor gtan bzhug par bya'o// dbye dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gu skam ka bya ste/ phreng gtan dang /
199b2('dul ba): gnas gzer dang / 'khor gtan dag gis bcad par bya'o// dbyug gu skam khas ni dbye bar bya'o// der sten dgos par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
199b3('dul ba): pa/ sa'i stegs bu dag bya'o// mkhrang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khri'u bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khri'u bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag
199b4('dul ba): gis khri'u ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kho ra khor yug tu khru bzhis 'khor ba'i khri'u bya zhing / de thags mas blangs par bya'o// de dag
199b5('dul ba): gis thags ma du yod par mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zags ma ni lnga ste/ mun 'ja'i dang / sha na'i dang / gres mI dang / ras ma'i dang / ba phra mo'i
199b6('dul ba): 'o// de dag 'khrang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stan nang tshangs can dag gting bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis stan nang tshangs can gting bar
199b7('dul ba): bya'o// zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis stan nang tshangs can ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid du khru bzhi pa/ zheng du khru do yod pa/ nyis
199b8('dul ba): ltab tu byas te grub par bya'o// de'i nang du shing bal gyis bkang bar bya'o// de dag gis shing bal du yod pa mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shing
200a1('dul ba): bal dag ni lnga ste/ arga'i shing bal dang / ka shi ka'i shing bal dang / a ra ka'i shing bal dang / smra ba'i shing bal dang / sha ma li'i shing
200a2('dul ba): bal dag yin no// gzhan yang lnga ste/ bal dang / sha ni'i shing bal dang / ras bal dang / ras ma dang / lo ma'i tshigs dag gis gang ba dag yin no// shing bal
200a3('dul ba): thams cad phyogs gcig tu btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo 'dor srubs bya rog rkang gis gzungs gdab par bya'o// 'khod pa na yur
200a4('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdos bu gdags par bya'o// ji ltar gdags pa mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skud pas gdags
200a5('dul ba): te rna ba la gdags par bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyug gus gzugs par bya'o// dge slong dag dbyug gu smig gu'i bcad
200a6('dul ba): 'phro lta bus 'jug pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bre'i bcang 'phro lta bu bya'o// 'on kyang snang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ma
200a7('dul ba): ngag gis bkris nas dal bus khang kyis khad kyis gzugs par bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pho long 'phang bar bya'o//
200a8('dul ba): dge slong dag gis mung khung du 'phangs pa na/ de'ikhyams nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zag gus btags te/ 'phang bar bya zhing / de nas yang phyir/
200b1('dul ba): drang bar bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdun du mar me bzhag par bya'o// 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
200b2('dul ba): pa/ rkang pa gcig rkyang bar bya'o// 'or kyang yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phreng thag la 'jug par bya'o// rkang pa ya gcig kyang rkyang bar bya'o//
200b3('dul ba): 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ langs te bcag par bya'o// dge slong dag chag pa na/ 'thom nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
200b4('dul ba): 'phreng zag la 'jug par bya'o// lag pa chang rgyud byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbu gu skon pa bskud pas btags la 'dzus te bcag par bya'o//
200b5('dul ba): mchil lham dang bcas pas 'chag par byed pa na sgra phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mchil lham can gyis bcag par mi bya'o// rdul gyi rkang pa
200b6('dul ba): gnyis ma rung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bar zang gting bar bya'o// snabs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
200b7('dul ba): dag ngas spong ba'i kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba bas nag gsum zhig rkang pa gnyis rku bar bya'o// dge slong spong ba bas kun du spyad
200b8('dul ba): pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshab can du 'gyur ro// de dag der mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
201a1('dul ba): sbal pa/ steng du rim khang gnyis pa bya'o// 'dzeg dka' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zem smras bya'o// ltung bar gyur
201a2('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha khyer gyis skor bar bya'o// de 'khrul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ lcags kyi gzer bu dag gi
201a3('dul ba): sdom par bya'o// 'on kyang mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ phyi rol du spong khang chen po bya'o// de dag sgo sprod dag tu byed pa na/ de dag phan tshun snang
201a4('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo snol mar gtod par bya'o// sgo khang bya'o// phug kyang bya'o// de dag de nas yur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
201a5('dul ba): sgo drung du snam bu 'am ras sbyangs te nyal bar bya zhing 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de dag de nas song shing / yang phyis 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
201a6('dul ba): pa/ dge slong dag slong ba'i zhal to byed pa sko bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i chos lnga dang ldan pa ni/ ma sgos pa yang sko bar mi bya la/ skos par yang dbyung
201a7('dul ba): bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang /
201a8('dul ba): ma byas pa mi shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni/ ma skos pa yang skos par mi bya la/ saskos pa yang dbyung bar bya'o//
201b1('dul ba): dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa/ chos lnga dang ldan pa ni/ ma skos pa yang sko bar bya la/ skos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /
201b2('dul ba): zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / spong ba la tron byas pa dang / ma byas pa shes pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal
201b3('dul ba): ta byed pa ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni/ ma skos pa yang skos par bya la/ skos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o// 'di ltar sko bar bya ste/
201b4('dul ba): je dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byed par spro 'am/ zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu de'i
201b5('dul ba): gnas mal bshams par byas nas/ 'ag+han d+he brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur
201b6('dul ba): pa la dge slong gis gso ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par
201b7('dul ba): spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i
201b8('dul ba): zhal ta bgyid par sko ste/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa
202a1('dul ba): rnams gsan du gsol// dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge slong 'di zhes bgyi
202a2('dul ba): ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsgo zhing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming
202a3('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par sgo zhing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyis pa dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cang
202a4('dul ba): ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi
202a5('dul ba): spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos shing / dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid de/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// /
202a6('dul ba): dge slong dag ngas dge slong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas spong khang du chag chags gdab par bya'o//
202a7('dul ba): phyag dar bya'o// lci ba gsar pa'i byug pas bkru bar bya'o// stan bshams par bya'o// bshang ba'i sa dang gci ba'i sa byi dor bya'o// chag chag gdab par bya'o//
202a8('dul ba): phyag 'dar bya'o// lci ba sar pa'i bkru bar bya'o// lo ma'i chang bu bzhag par bya'o// bong rngog dang sa dang chu bzhag par bya'o// de dag re re'i gam du song ste 'bod par
202b1('dul ba): byed pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re re nas 'bod par mi bya bar 'gran d+he brdung bar bya'o// de nas 'gran d+he rgya chen brdungs pa dang / ji tsam na spyod
202b2('dul ba): yul gyi grong mi rnams chom rkun pa ma 'ongs sam/ zhes bsdangs nas/ de rnams go bgos te lhags nas/ 'phags pa dag ci chom rkun pa dag mchis sam zhes
202b3('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag chom rkun pa dag ma lhags te/ 'di ltar spong ba la tron byed do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag rnam par
202b4('dul ba): 'tshe ba la tron mdzad kyis/ 'di na spong ba ga la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
202b5('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'ag d+he rgya cher brdung bar mi bya ste/ 'di la 'ag+na d+he de ni lnga ste/ dge 'dun bsdu ba'i 'gyu d+he dang / las kyi 'gan d+he dang /
202b6('dul ba): shi ba'i 'gan d+he dang / spong ba'i 'ag+ne dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i 'ag+ne'o// de la dge 'dun bsdu ba'i 'ag+ne ni/ rgyud gsum dang rtog pa gsum mo// las kyi 'gru
202b7('dul ba): d+he ni rgo gcig rgyud gcig dang rtog pa gsum mo// shes pa'i 'ag+ha d+he de ni byi ba'o// spong ba'i 'gan d+he ni 'khar bsil lo// gnod pa byung ba'i 'ag+ne ni/ ji tsam
202b8('dul ba): gyis chog pa'o// de dag dus ting la thug pa na ci bder byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ting la thug pa ni ci bder mi bya bar 'du shes par
203a1('dul ba): byas nas/ ci bder byas te/ dge 'dun las 'tshal ma thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang khrus byas nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du khom pa
203a2('dul ba): dang bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas/ grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom par bya'o// de dag de bzhin du ci bder byed nas/
203a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de kho na bzhin du ci bder mi bya bar rgyun chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o// de dag ha cang mang du 'don par byed nas/ bco
203a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang mang du gdon par mi bya'o// de dag ha cang nyung ngur 'don par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang nyung
203a5('dul ba): ngur 'don par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar ran par 'don par bya'o// de dag yon bshad par mi byed na/ bcom ldan 'das 'ad kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad par bya'o//
203a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis sus yon bshad pa mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
203a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi yon bshad par bya'o// de dag yon bshad pa ha cang mang du byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bshad pa ha cang
203a8('dul ba): mang du mi bya'o// de dag ha cang nyung ngur byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ yon bshad pa ha cang nyung ngur mi bya ste/ 'di ltar yon bshad par ran
203b1('dul ba): par bya'o// dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyis 'jug tu 'dra zhing thams cad kyi mdun du 'gyes par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
203b2('dul ba): pa/ dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi 'jug tu 'gyes par bya zhing / thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o// gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na/ des phyogs
203b3('dul ba): dben par lde mig sbas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu sbas kyis phye la zhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o// dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas kun
203b4('dul ba): du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te/ mi 'jug na 'gal tshab can du 'gyur ro// de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o// bya ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyis gsol
203b5('dul ba): pa dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa 'di ni bya ba zhes bya'o// gso sbyong gang zhe na/ dge slong dag ngas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa
203b6('dul ba): gang yin pa ste/ de khyed kyis ni de phyin chad zla phyed phyed cing gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i modo 'don par bya'o zhes bka'
203b7('dul ba): stsal nas/ de dag gis su gdon pa mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so so thar pa'i mdo gdon
203b8('dul ba): bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba phyed phyed thar pa'i mdo gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dag de'i gnas khang du 'du
204a1('dul ba): bar byed pa na/ de dag der mi shong ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
204a2('dul ba): stsal pa/ gnas khang du gdon par mi bya'o// de dag khyam su gdon par byed pa na/ der yang mi shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gnas
204a3('dul ba): la blo 'thun par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gso sbyong gi gnas la blo 'thun par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ de dag gis gang du blo 'thun par bya mi shes nas/
204a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas thams cad grub pa 'am/ byas pa 'am/ zin pa nang 'tshams phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa dge 'dun gyi
204a5('dul ba): gso sbyong gis gan su 'dod pa gang yin pa de la blo 'thun par bya'o// 'di ltar blo 'thun par bya ste/ gnas mal bsham par byas nas 'gye brdungs te dris pa'i tshig
204a6('dul ba): gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo nas dge 'dun tha~Md 'dug cing 'thun par gyur nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/ las byas so// dge 'dun
204a7('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa 'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lag pa nang 'tshams dang / phyi rol gyi nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun
204a8('dul ba): gyis gso sbyong gi gnasu bzhed na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis thams cad grub
204b1('dul ba): / byas pa'am/ lags pa dang 'arnams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dos gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyigs skyong gi gnasu blo 'thun par bgyi'o//
204b2('dul ba): 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad grub pa 'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa nang 'cha
204b3('dul ba): dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang / bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnasu bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub pa 'am/ bgyis pa
204b4('dul ba): 'am/ lags pa nang 'tshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnasu blo 'thun par bgyis na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag
204b5('dul ba): gnas thams cad grub pa'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa nang 'tshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas su
204b6('dul ba): blo 'thun par bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyi
204b7('dul ba): gnas thams cad grub pa 'am/ bgyis pa 'am/ lags pa nang tshangs dang / phyi rol 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas blo 'thun par bgyis
204b8('dul ba): lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang gi dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo 'thun par byas pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la/
205a1('dul ba): gas sbyong dang dgag dbye dang / gsol dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi mthun par byed na 'gal chab ban du 'gyuro//
205a2('dul ba): 'dul ba bzhi// bam po bcu gnyis pa// // sdom la/ ka pi na dang chos gos dang / dgrol dang 'tshams chung 'tshams chen dang // gnang dang skyang skyer sgrol ba dang /
205a3('dul ba): bcad dang mi 'bral ma bcad dang // grong dgon las dang gdon pa yi// sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na'o de ma'i tshal bya
205a4('dul ba): ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka bi na'i rgyal po'i khab na sde can mi'i phug na gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyis sdom pas dge
205a5('dul ba): 'dun dang 'thun par 'dug go/ de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe gso sbyong gi gnasu 'dag cing 'thun par gyur nas/ shas cher tshe dang
205a6('dul ba): ldan pa bram ze ka bi na 'di snyam du sems te/ deng dge 'dun gso sbyong bcwo lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong ka bi na'i gso sbyong yang bcwo lnga yin la/ ci dge 'dun gyi
205a7('dul ba): gso slong gi gnas su 'gro bar bya 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnasu 'gro bar mi bya'o// ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyam su myong bar bya 'am/
205a8('dul ba): 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyam su myong bar mi bya/ ci dag 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba
205b1('dul ba): ngag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu gas su myong bar bya'am/
205b2('dul ba): 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyam su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rtag tu dag pa'i snying po ste// rtag tu dag pa gso
205b3('dul ba): sbyong yin// gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa// de'i brtul shugs grub par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pas/ bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam
205b4('dul ba): mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze ka pi na'i sems kyis yongs su rtogs pa thugasu chud nA/ 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ sde can mi'i
205b5('dul ba): phrag tu tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i mdun du bzhugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ka bi na khyod cig pu dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog pa na/
205b6('dul ba): 'di snyam du deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcwo lnga pa yin la/ bdag dge slong ka pi na'i gso sbyong yang bcwo lnga pa yin na/ ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro
205b7('dul ba): bar bya 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar ba mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyam su myong bar bya 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang
205b8('dul ba): lhan cig gso sbyong nyam su myong bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /
206a1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag dang dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag nyam su myong bar bya
206a2('dul ba): 'am/ 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyam su myong bar mi bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rtag tu dag pa'i snying po
206a3('dul ba): ste/ rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin// gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa// de'i rtul shugs grub par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pas/ bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang
206a4('dul ba): ldan pa'o snyam du sems la/ sems kyi yongs su rtog pa ma byung ngam/ btsun pa byung ngo // ka bi na khyod re shig dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gro'o// gzhan su
206a5('dul ba): zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi byed na/ khyod kyis dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro na/
206a6('dul ba): gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur// khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyam su myong bar mi byed na/ gzhan su zhig nyam su myong
206a7('dul ba): bar byed/ ka pi na de lta bas na/ khyod kyi dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gan su mi 'gro bar ma byed par song shig/ ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa
206a8('dul ba): dag tu mi 'gro bar mi byed par song shig/ ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang / dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyam su mi myong bar ma byed par nyamasu myong bar gyis shig/
206b1('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka bi na'i lag nas khrid nas gso sbyong gi gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung
206b2('dul ba): la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong dag gis gso
206b3('dul ba): sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas/ 'tshams chen po bcad par rjesu gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas/ 'tshams chen po
206b4('dul ba): bcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar spyad par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rje dang por dge slong gnas
206b5('dul ba): ba dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis 'tshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan por shar phyogs ni pa bong gi mtshan ma dang / rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan
206b6('dul ba): ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po zugs
206b7('dul ba): bar bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogasu pa bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing gi ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i
206b8('dul ba): mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po bzugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham
207a1('dul ba): par byas nas/ 'gan d+he brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo bas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur
207a2('dul ba): bar la/ dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis 'tshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan por shar phyogasu ni ba bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig
207a3('dul ba): pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa'i
207a4('dul ba): la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan pos bzugs brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogasu yang pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/
207a5('dul ba): ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
207a6('dul ba): ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/ las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir
207a7('dul ba): dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis 'tshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogasu ni pa bong gi mtshan ma 'am/
207a8('dul ba): rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogasu ni ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs
207b1('dul ba): kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la
207b2('dul ba): bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas/ 'di lta ste gnas pa
207b3('dul ba): bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge 'dun gyis grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma rtogs par/ dgon pa la thug pa dang gnas
207b4('dul ba): mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan de gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di
207b5('dul ba): na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi 'tshams chen po gcad do// phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogasu ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/
207b6('dul ba): rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogasu ni ka ba'i mtshan ma brtan po 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ nub phyogasu ni ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/
207b7('dul ba): bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogasu ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi mtshan
207b8('dul ba): ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong cig pa'i gnas kyi bsdom pas/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong dang grong
208a1('dul ba): khyer nye 'khor ma rtogs par/ dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas lasal la thug pa'i bar du 'tshams chen po gcod na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang
208a2('dul ba): dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong cig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas/ 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi
208a3('dul ba): ba'i slad du grong dang grong khyer gyi nye 'khor ma rtogs par dgon pa la zug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du 'tshams chen pos gcod par bzod pa de dag
208a4('dul ba): ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing bzod cing gnang te/ dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du
208a5('dul ba): gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong dang grong khyer gi nye 'khor
208a6('dul ba): ma rtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas ma la la thug pa'i bar du 'tshams chen po gcod lags te/ 'di ltar cing mi gsung bas de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun
208a7('dul ba): gyis gang du 'tshams gcod pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste/ gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang / gsol pa dang / gsol pa dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang
208a8('dul ba): bzhi'i las bya'o// mi 'thun pa byed na 'gal tshab can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams chos gos gsum thogs te/ nyin mo spyod yul du 'dong pa na skyo bar gyur pa'i
208b1('dul ba): skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis
208b2('dul ba): chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o// 'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ 'gan d+he brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge
208b3('dul ba): slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/ las bya'o// dge 'dun
208b4('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyis sdom pas 'tshams chen po gcad pa las
208b5('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams
208b6('dul ba): bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'tshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang brtsa
208b7('dul ba): to// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// 'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gnas
208b8('dul ba): kyi sdom pas 'tshams chen po gcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi
209a1('dul ba): skad du/ 'tshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral ba mi 'gyur ba'i gnang brtsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang
209a2('dul ba): dag 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'tshams chen po'inang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag
209a3('dul ba): dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba brtsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod
209a4('dul ba): cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsa la lags te/ 'di
209a5('dul ba): ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i khongs su dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang / 'bral bar mi
209a6('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der/ dge slong rnams stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong dag
209a7('dul ba): la zhi'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag 'byung zhing / lnga'i tshogs kyi las bya ba dag 'byung zhing / bcu'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung nas/ de dag dge 'dun zad
209a8('dul ba): bsdud par byed pa na/ dge slong rnams kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /
209b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tshams bu chung gcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo 'thun par bya'o// 'di ltar gcad par bya ste/ dze dang por 'tshams chen
209b2('dul ba): po dgrol bar bya'o// 'di ltar grol bar bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ 'gan d+he brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par gyon nas/
209b3('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gson du gsol/ 'di lta
209b4('dul ba): ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas/ 'tshams chen pos gcad la gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge
209b5('dul ba): 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'tshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar bya'o// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun btsun
209b6('dul ba): ba rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'tshams chen po bcad de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi mtsham
209b7('dul ba): chen po zhig cing dgrol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'tshams chen po zhig cing dgrol bar 'dod par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod
209b8('dul ba): ba de dag ni gsungs shig/ 'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du lan gsum du bzlas/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyi 'tshams chen po
210a1('dul ba): gshig cing bkrol lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug
210a2('dul ba): mar gnas pa rnams kyis 'tshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po// shar phyogasu ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab 'am/ srad bu bres pa 'am/ rdo bzhag pa 'am/
210a3('dul ba): srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa 'am/
210a4('dul ba): srad bu bres pa 'am rdo bzhag pa 'am/ srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ 'ag+ne brdungs
210a5('dul ba): te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa
210a6('dul ba): rnams kyis 'tsham su bu chung gis phyogs bzhi'i brtan po// shar phyogasu ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa 'am/ srad bu bres pa 'am/ rdo bzhag pa 'am/ srol gtod pa
210a7('dul ba): la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / nu byang phyogasu yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa 'am/ sred bu bres pa 'am/
210a8('dul ba): bzhag pa 'am/ srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/ las bya te/ dge 'dun btsun
210b1('dul ba): pa rnams gsan du gsol// 'di lta ste/ gnas thams cad ni dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis 'tshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po
210b2('dul ba): brjod pa/ shar phyogasu ni seng ldeng gi bur pa btab pa lags te/ lho phyogasu ni srad bu bres pa lags/ nub phyogasu ni rdo bzhag pa lags/ byang phyogs su ni srol gtod
210b3('dul ba): pa brtan po lags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta
210b4('dul ba): ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'tshams bu chung gcod cing dkyil 'khor bar blo 'thun par mdzad do// 'di ni
210b5('dul ba): gsol ba'o// las 'di ltar byas te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams
210b6('dul ba): kyis 'tshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogasu ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/ lho phyogasu ni srad bu bres pa lags/ nub
210b7('dul ba): phyogs su ni rdo ba bzhag pa lags/ byang phyogasu ni srol gtod pa brtan po legs te/ de'i 'og slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas
210b8('dul ba): bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la rig par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'tshangs bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo 'thun par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa
211a1('dul ba): gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'tshams
211a2('dul ba): bu chung gcad cing / dkyil 'khor bar blo 'thun par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun
211a3('dul ba): gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di ltar gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i
211a4('dul ba): slad du/ 'tshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo 'thun par mdzad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de'i 'og tu 'tshams
211a5('dul ba): chen po gcad par bya'o// 'di ltar gcad par bya'o// je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis 'tshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan
211a6('dul ba): ma brtan po// shar phyogasu ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/
211a7('dul ba): bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma nyam/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang
211a8('dul ba): phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi
211b1('dul ba): mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o// de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ 'gye brdungs
211b2('dul ba): te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/ dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar/
211b3('dul ba): gnas pa rnams kyi 'tshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma chen po brtan pa'o// shar phyogasu ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan
211b4('dul ba): ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
211b5('dul ba): brtan po brjod par bya'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogasu yang pa bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/
211b6('dul ba): shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/ lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po
211b7('dul ba): brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ lam po'i che'i
211b8('dul ba): mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun bcun
212a1('dul ba): pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'di nyid na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi 'tshams chen po phyogs
212a2('dul ba): bzhi'i mtshan ma brjod pa/ shar phyogasu ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ lho phyogasu ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma lag
212a3('dul ba): nub phyogasu ni ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma lags/ byang phyogasu ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma lags na/ gal te
212a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas/
212a5('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /
212a6('dul ba): gnas mal la thug gi bar du mtshams chen po gcad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// 'di lta ste/
212a7('dul ba): gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang / gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis 'tshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/ shar phyogasu ni ba bong gi mtshan ma
212a8('dul ba): 'am/ rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/ lho phyogasu ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po legs/ nub phyogasu ni ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ bya
212b1('dul ba): skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/ byang phyogasu ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/ khron pa laglos pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma/
212b2('dul ba): 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas/ 'di lta ste/ gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong
212b3('dul ba): dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du 'tshams chen po gcad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi
212b4('dul ba): nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi bsdoms pas/ 'di lta ste gnas bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye
212b5('dul ba): 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du 'tshams chen po gcod par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod
212b6('dul ba): ba de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge slong gis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/ gnas
212b7('dul ba): bsdu ba dang / dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong drang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang / gnas mal la thug
212b8('dul ba): gi bar du 'di ltar 'tshams chen po bcad lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge 'dun gyi nang du 'tshams chen po gcad pa der/ dge slong
213a1('dul ba): rnams kyis 'dug ste gso sbyong bya zhing gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang / gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o// mi 'thun par byed
213a2('dul ba): na 'gal tshab can du 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu 'tshams chen po'i bar du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dang / mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o// 'di lta sbyin par
213a3('dul ba): bya ste/ gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/ 'gan d+he brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par
213a4('dul ba): gyur pa la/ dge slong gcig gis gso ba byas te/ las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong
213a5('dul ba): gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas/ 'tshams chen po gcad pa las/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang //
