445b5('dul ba): rnams ni gtum pa/ gzu lums can rtsub pa/ gshe ba spro thung ba 'phya ba yin te/ gang po gal te khyod la 'gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha' mi rnams mngon sum
445b6('dul ba): du sdig pa tshogs par mi 'thung ba'i tshig brtsub bos pashe bar byed/ zher 'debs par byed/ 'bya bar byed na/ de la khyod ji snyam du sems/ btsun pa gal te
445b7('dul ba): bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mi rnams bdag la mngon sum du sdig pa'i tshogs par mi 'byung ba'i tshig rtsub pos bshe bar bgyid/ zher 'debs par bgyid/ 'phya
445b8('dul ba): bar byed na/ de la bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'i'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no// e ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i
446a1('dul ba): mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag bdag la sdig pa'i tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig brtsub pos pa she bar byed/
446a2('dul ba): zher 'debs par byed/ 'phya bar byed kyang lag pa 'am bong bsam rgyab snyam mo// gang po 'gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni gtum pa zhes bya ba
446a3('dul ba): na/ 'phya bar byed pa yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ gang po gal te gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis dbyug po 'am/ mtshon gyis
446a4('dul ba): rgyab na de la khyod ji snyams du byed/ btsun pa gal te bdag la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon gyis rgyab par gyur na/
446a5('dul ba): de la bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no// kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i/
446a6('dul ba): mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa dag yin te/ de dag bdag la dbyug pa 'am/ mtshon gyis rgyab kyang / thams cad kyis thams cad du srog dang bral bar mi byed do snyam
446a7('dul ba): mo// gang po gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni gtum pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'phya bar byed pa yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ gang po gal te gro bzhin
446a8('dul ba): skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis khyod thams cad kyis thams cad du srog dang bral bar byed na/ de la khyod ji snyam du byed/ btsun pa gal te bdag gro
446b1('dul ba): bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis thams cad kyis thams cad du srog dang bral bar bgyid na/ de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das//
446b2('dul ba): kyi nyan thos lus gnag can 'dis skyob dang / ngo tsha ba dang / rnam par smin pa gang dag mtshon gyis kyang 'debs par byed/ dag kyang za bar byed/ thag pas
446b3('dul ba): kyang 'gegs te 'chi bar byed/ g.yang sa nas kyang mchongs te 'chi ba yod na/ kye ma gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/
446b4('dul ba): de dag bdag gis lus rnag can 'di las tsheg chung ngus grol bar byed do snyam par byed do// gang po leg so legs so// gang po khyod bzod pa dang / des pa 'di
446b5('dul ba): dang ldan par gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar gnas par nus pa ni khyod yang legaso gang po song la ma gral ba rnams ni sgrol cig/ ma grol ba rnam
446b6('dul ba): ni khrol cig/ dbugs mi phyin pa rnams ni dbugs phru shig/ yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongasu mya ngan las zlos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan
446b7('dul ba): gang po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing / rjesu yid rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom
446b8('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po de nyid kyis mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thog/
447a1('dul ba): nas/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ zas phyi mi'i bsod snyom
447a2('dul ba): las slar log ste/ gnas mal ji ltar longs spyod pa 'khosu phab nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar gang
447a3('dul ba): na ba der chas te/ rims kyi rgyu zhing song ba na/ gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar phyin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po snga dro shams thabs bgos//
447a4('dul ba): lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te// gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ rngon pa zhig mda' gzhags lag na thog te
447a5('dul ba): ri dgas mchor du 'gro ba des mthong nas/ des bsams dge sbyong mgo reg 'di mthong ba ni kha ma rung bas byas so// snyam bsams nas/ gzhu' sna drung du
447a6('dul ba): bkang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pon pa der rgyugs pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gla gos bsnyil te smras pa/ bzhin
447a7('dul ba): bzangs dag dgang dka' ba 'di'i don du zhugs pas 'di la snun cig/ tshigasu bcad de yang smras pa// gang gi don du mkha' la bya bzhin ri dgas nis zin gyur/
447a8('dul ba): g.yul ngor mtha' mdung mda' bo che thogs mi rnams 'chi 'gyur la// bkren pa nyon mongs yul ngan rgyu zhing mchil ba nyi zin// sdig pa rab mang lnga 'dir khyod kyis
447b1('dul ba): tsham rings mda' 'phangs shig/ des bsams pa/ rab tu byung ba 'di ni 'di lta bu'i bzod pa dang nges pa dang ldan pa yin no// ci'i phyir 'di la mda' 'phang snyam du bsam
447b2('dul ba): nas/ de sems mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de la chos bshad de/ skyabasu 'gro ba dang / slab pa'i bzhi rnams la bzhag pa dang /
447b3('dul ba): des ri khrod der gnas lnga brgya ni dge slong du byas/ lnga brgya ni dge bsnyen par byas nas/ gtsug lag khang lnga brgya rtsig tu bcug ste/ khri dang khri'u dang / stan nang
447b4('dul ba): tshangs can dang / sngas nang tshangs can dang / gar thabs brgya phrag da ma 'bul du bcug go/ zla ba gsum po de 'das pa dang / des rig pa sum lus kyis mngon
447b5('dul ba): sum du byas nas/ dgra bcom par gyur te/ kham gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas/ dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa' rnams kyis mchod
447b6('dul ba): pa dbyas pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ shing gi rna cha can gyi nu bo gnyis
447b7('dul ba): longs spyod sra bas shing yongasu zad gtugs par gyur nas/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ byur lta bu de bdag gi khyim du song nas/ tshur shog lhan cig gnas par
447b8('dul ba): bya'o// des smras pa/ byung lta bu de gang zhig yin/ gang po yin mod/ de ni kho bo'o khyim nas dpal 'byung ba yin gyis de byur lta bu ni ma yino// de gnyis kyis
448a1('dul ba): smras pa/ dpal yang rung tshur shog lhan cig gnas par bya'o// des smras pa/ khyed cag nor ni rigs pas sgrubs pa ma
448a2('dul ba): yin la/ kho bo ni rigs pas sgrubs pa yin pas/ khyed cag dang kho bo lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bran mo'i bu des rgya mtsho chen
448a3('dul ba): bor yang song yang song nas/ khyod kyis longs spyod dag sgrub pas/ khyod de spyad pas rgyagasu zad/ khyod kyi ni rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par ga la nas/ de de gnyis
448a4('dul ba): las nga rgyal bzung nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'dzag par bya'o// snyam nas zhes bya ba nas rgya mtsho chen por zhagaso zhes bya ba'i bar
448a5('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o// ji tsam na gru bo che rjesu 'thun pa'i rlung gis tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal du bad so// sa mkhan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag tsan dan sa mchog
448a6('dul ba): gi tshal zhes grags pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin no// 'di las ngoms la longs shig/ de'i tshe tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal gyis dbang po gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po
448a7('dul ba): zhes bya ba yin te/ de yang gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song ngo // de nas tsan dan sa mchog gi tshel sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis bcad par brtsam so//
448a8('dul ba): gnod sbyin mi dga' ba zhes bya bas tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis gcod par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po ga la
448b1('dul ba): kha der song ste phyin nas/ gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// dpon po mkhyen par mdzod cig tsan dan sa mchog gi cha la sta re lnga brgya tsam
448b2('dul ba): gyis 'gums nas/ khyod kyi 'phrin las sam bgyi ba gang legs pa de mdzod cig/ de nas gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun ma
448b3('dul ba): byas nas mi bzod pa skyes te/ rlung nag chen po 'jig su rung ba slang nas/ tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal gang na ba der chas so// sa mkhan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan
448b4('dul ba): dag 'dzam bu gling pa'i tshong pa rnams nyon cig/ rlung nag po chen po 'jigs pa zhig yod do zhes grag pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin gyis/ ngo lon soms shig/ de nas
448b5('dul ba): tshong pa'i tshogs de rnams 'jigs skrag ste/ phongs shing ba sku'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/ lha rnams la gsol pa/ byed par rtsom te/
448b6('dul ba): zhi ba dang chu lha lus ngan nor lha'i tshogs// lha mi lto 'phye gnod sbyin lha min dbang po rnams// bdag cag shin tu nyams thag 'jigs par gyur lags kyis// skye
448b7('dul ba): bral de ring ba dang bdag cag rnams kyi mgon mdzod cig/ mi rnams kha cig bde tshogs khyod la 'dud gzhan dang tshangs dang khyab mjug lha chen dang / ser chen shing
448b8('dul ba): dang tshal la rten pa la/ sha za'i rlung gis zin pas skyabs tshol 'dug/ shing gi rna cha can sems las chung ngur 'dug pa dang // tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/ ded dpon
449a1('dul ba): bdag cag ni sdug bsngal mi bzod pa nyam nga bar gyur nas/ khyod ci'i phyir sems las chung ngur 'dug/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho la/
449a2('dul ba): nu bos bsgo ba/ phu bo rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni mnod chung la nyes dmigs mang ste/ srid pas ldongs pa phal cher 'jug kyang slar 'khor ba nyung bas khyod kyis
449a3('dul ba): rnam pa gang gis kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mi bya'o// zhes bsgo ba las kho bos de'i tshig ma mnyan te/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pas/ nga ci'i phyir yang med do//
449a4('dul ba): khyod kyi nu bo gang yin/ gang po yin no// tsheng pa'i tshogs rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'phags pa gang po de ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan
449a5('dul ba): pa yin gyis/ de nyid la bdag cag skyab su 'gro bar bya'o zhes de thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces 'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags
449a6('dul ba): pa gang po de la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshalo zhes smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po la mngon par dga' ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa gang po gdan
449a7('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa khyod kyi gcen ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur gyis dgongasu gsol/
449a8('dul ba): des bsams te de nas sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha' nas mi snang bar gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i grwa'i ngor dkyil
449b1('dul ba): mo bcas nas 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas rlung nag po de ring rab la phog ste/ rdugs pa bzhin du slar logs par gyur to//
449b2('dul ba): gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen pos bsams pa mngon chad ni rlung nag pos gru gang la reg pa de shing bal gyi mdab ma bzhin 'phangs pa dang 'jig par gyur na/ da rlung nag po
449b3('dul ba): de ri rab la phog te 'dug pa bzhin du/ slar log par gyur pa'i rgyur pa'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/ phan tshun rtag par brtsams pa las/ ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa gang
449b4('dul ba): po gru'i ngor dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang des smras pa/ 'phags pa gang po tho tsam te ci bgyi/ gang pos smras pa/ dga' ba'i chos
449b5('dul ba): can kho bo nyid tho tshams 'am/ gal te ngas 'di lta bu'i ngor yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob par gyur na khyod kyi nga'i phu bo ming lus par byas pa 'gyuraro// dbang phyug chen
449b6('dul ba): bos smras pa/ 'phags pa tsan dan sa mchog 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i don du srungs lag so// gang pos spras pa dpon po ji snyam du sems/
449b7('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gang che/ 'phags pa ci bcom ldan 'das 'di/
449b8('dul ba): du byung ngam/ byung ngo gal te de lta na da gang ba ma gang ba de khongs shing / de nas tshong ba'i tshogs de nas srog phyin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la sems mngon par dad nas/ gru
450a1('dul ba): de tsan dan sa mchog gis bkang ste chas pa dang / rims kyis grong khyer sro ma lta bur phyin to// de nas gang pos phu bo la smras
450a2('dul ba): pa/ gang gi ming gis gru bo cher gru'i nor grub ste/ 'ongs pa de ni de dbang bas/ khyod kyi rin po'i tshangs pa 'di rnams la dgos shig/ bdag gis tsan dan
450a3('dul ba): sa mchog 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir can dan gyi 'phreng ba'i khang bzangs brtsig go// de nas tshong ba de rnams la rin po che rnams bgos so//
450a4('dul ba): de nas gang pos tsan dan sa mchog gi khang bzangs zhig rtsig par brtsams te/ des bzo bo dag bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nyi ma re re zhing kar sha pa na
450a5('dul ba): lnga brgya lnga brgya len nam/ 'on te tsan dan sa mchog gi phyi ma pho sum gang 'tshalo// ji tsam na ring po ma thogs par can dan sa mchog gi 'phreng ba'i khang bzangs
450a6('dul ba): brtsigs te/ byi dor thams cad zin par gyur to// de nas zhogs ma dang / phye ma'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag kyang brtags nas/ de nyid la zhal zhal du
450a7('dul ba): byugs so// des spun de rnams thams cad bzod pa gsol du bcug nas smras pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drongs la zhal
450a8('dul ba): zas gsol cig/ 'phags pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gang na zhugs/ mnyan yod na'o// lam ji srid mchis/ mnyan yod du dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam mo//
450b1('dul ba): re shig rgyal po la brtag par bya'o// de bzhin du bgyis shig/ de dag rgyal po'i drung du dong nas/ lba ba dag cag ni rgyal sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
450b2('dul ba): 'dun spyan drangs te/ zhal zas gsol bar 'tshal na/ lhas bdag la btang du gsol/ rung gis de bzhin bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po khang stengasu 'dzeg
450b3('dul ba): nas rgyal byed kyi tshal log su kha bltas te/ pus mo'i lhang gnyis sa la btsugs te 'dug nas/ me tog gis gtor/ bdug pas bdugs nas/ khyim pa zhig gser
450b4('dul ba): gyi bya ma bum 'dzin du bcug ste/ gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/ tshul khrims rnams dag shin tu rnam dag blo// zhal zas dus rtag tu ni don gzigs pa
450b5('dul ba): mgon med pa de rab tu gzigs nas ni/ shin tu thugs brtse mdzad de gshegasu gsol// de nas me tog de rnams sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
450b6('dul ba): lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me tog gi khang bzangasu byas te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du rgan rims bzhin gnas par gyur te 'dug pa ni sprin ltar spungaso// chu ni bai duH
450b7('dul ba): phur ma lta bur gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas pa yin pas/ thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa spyan
450b8('dul ba): 'dren pa gang nas mchis/ kun dga' bo grong khyer sbom lta bu nas so// btsun pa grong khyer sro ma lta bur ji srid cig mchis/ kun dga' bo dpag tshad brgya lhag can
451a1('dul ba): yod kyis song la/ dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang dang gang grong khyer sbo ma lta bur song nas/ zin za bar spo bas tshul shing long shig/
451a2('dul ba): ces bsgo shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ tshul shing blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
451a3('dul ba): spyan sngar 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshul shing blangs so// de'i tshe yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gan
451a4('dul ba): brtan tshe dang ldan pa gang po shes rab kyi rnams par grol ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'dug par gyur pa des kyang tshul shing blangs par brtsams pa dang / de la tshe dang
451a5('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos slar tshig su bcad de smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa zan 'di ni// ko gsal bdag po'i pho brang ngam// rab sbyin khyim dang ri dgas kyi// khyim kyi
451a6('dul ba): zas kyang ma lagaso// grong khyer slom zhes bya ba/ dpag tshad brgya lhag mchis pa der// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni bzhud 'tshal bas// gang po khyod ni ma gsungs bzhugs//
451a7('dul ba): de shes rab kyi rnam par grol ba yin gyis// de rdzu 'phrul ma skyed pas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag gi nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' dag gsal zhing
451a8('dul ba): bor la/ so sor spangs na/ bdag mu stegs can dang mthun mongs pa'i rdzu 'phrul sgyid lugs gam snyam nas/ des brtson 'grus la gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul brgyad
451b1('dul ba): pas ji srid tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan gsum pa la tshul shing ma byin pa de'i bar du des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas tshul shing blangs te/
451b2('dul ba): de nas tshigasu bcad pa smras pa// ko ta ma 'di ni mngon shes drug po nyid// grags pa dang ni thos pas thob min la// tshad kyi yon tan rnams dang gang gang ni// yid
451b3('dul ba): mod chen po kyang ni ma yin gyis// bdag 'dra yong su rtog par byed pa rnams// rgas pas dad yal gyur pas zhi ba dang // tshul khrims lhag mthong stobs dang bsam
451b4('dul ba): gtan stobs// rnam pa du mas mngon shes drug ldan 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di nga'i dge slong
451b5('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog yin te/ nga'i nyan thos mchod pa'i tshul shing blang ba la dang por tshul shing len pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i
451b6('dul ba): gnas brtan gang po mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la ngas dge slong dag khyed
451b7('dul ba): kyis dge ba mi spyoms pa dang / sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad do// khyod kyis kyang grong khyer de na mu stegs pa rnams gnas pas/ khyed las
451b8('dul ba): gang gis rdzu 'phrul gang thob pa de/ des grong khyer sro ma lta bur song la/ zan za bar bya'o// zhes sgrogs shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun
452a1('dul ba): dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
452a2('dul ba): ces ngas dge slong rnams kyis dge ba mi spyoms pa dang / sdig pa mi bca' bar gnas par bya'o// zhes bshad mod kyis zhes bya ba nas song la zan za bar bya'o zhes
452a3('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// rgyal po grong khyer slo ma lta bur rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams sel du bcug ste/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri zhim
452a4('dul ba): bos spos phor sna tshogs bshams/ dar gyi chun mtshang mang po spangs/ me tog sna tshogs chal par bkram ste/ dga' dga' ltar byas so// grong khyer slo ma lha
452a5('dul ba): bu la sgo bcwo brgyad yod la/ rgyal po de la yang bu bcu bdun yod de/ grong khyer gyi sgo re rer so sor rgyal po'i bu rnams 'byor pa mchog dang bkod do// sgo chen
452a6('dul ba): bor ni slom lta bu'i bdag rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / shing gi rna cha can dang rgyal skyegs kyi cha can dang / zhe de'i rna cha can dang 'dag go//
452a7('dul ba): ji tsam du lo ma 'drim pa dang / shang rtse 'drim pa dang / snod spyad 'drim pa dag/ rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags pa rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ ji btsun pa gang po btso
452a8('dul ba): ldan 'das gshegs sam/ des smras pa/ 'di dag ni lo mi 'drim pa dang / shang rtsi 'dris pa dang / sdod spyad 'drim pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma la lags/
452b1('dul ba): ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas rten rnams bsam gtan la snyoms pa rnam pa du ma lhags pa dang / rgyal pos yang dris pa/ ci btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das
452b2('dul ba): gshegs sam/ des smras pa/ ma lags te/ 'di dag ni dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams pa du mas lhags pa
452b3('dul ba): lags so// de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigasu bcad de smras pa// kha cig seng ge stag dang glang chen dang // rta klu khyu mchog bzang po 'byibs// kha cig rin chen gzhal
452b4('dul ba): med khang dang ni// ri dang shIng rta 'bar la rten// gzhan dag na mkha'i ngos las chu 'dzin klog gis 'phreng bas brgyan pa lta bur ni// rab tu dgos bzhin lha'i pho brang lta
452b5('dul ba): bur rdzu 'phrul dag gis gshegs par brtson// kha cig sa rdol gyen du 'byung // kha cig na mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab// kha cig stan nas sprul par byed// rdzu 'phrul
452b6('dul ba): ldan pa'i mthu la bltos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du bzhugs nas// gdan bsham
452b7('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugs te/ skra drang por srang nas dgongs pa mngon sum du phyogs par bzhag go// ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i
452b8('dul ba): zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa na/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so// chem chem/ rab tu
453a1('dul ba): chem che ma kun tu rkyem chem ste/ shar phyogs mthon ni nub phyogs dpa'/ nub phyogs mthon ni shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho nan
453a2('dul ba): byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o// rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la dris pa la/
453a3('dul ba): 'phags pa gang po 'di ci zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa des na sa
453a4('dul ba): rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur pa lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi 'od zer kha dog de lta bu'i 'od bkye ste/ des 'dzam bu gling gser zhun ma lta bur
453a5('dul ba): snang bar to// yang rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bye nas bris pa/ 'phags pa gang po 'di ci lags/ des spras pa/ rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gser
453a6('dul ba): gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer bgyi ba lag so// 'dul ba bzhi/ bam po nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/
453a7('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor zhi pa 'khor zhi ba/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu slob ma ltar gshegaso// de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
453a8('dul ba): na gnas pa'i lha des bku la'i yal ga zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das lnga grib ma byed cing / rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
453b1('dul ba): de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad
453b2('dul ba): par mdzad de/ thos nas lha des 'jigs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu'i mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par gyur to// /
453b3('dul ba): ji tsam na phugs gzhan zhig na yugs mo lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
453b4('dul ba): kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po rgya bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od mdom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri
453b5('dul ba): bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang bar mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu yang de rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dang ba chen po skyes so// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/
453b6('dul ba): ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyis sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar/ lo bcu gnyisu zhi gnas kyi sems gom par byas pa dang //
453b7('dul ba): bu med pas bu snyed pa dang / dbul pos gter mthong ba dang / rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas rgyal srid kyi dbang skur ba ni de ltar nyams dga' ba skyed pa
453b8('dul ba): ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams 'dul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis gung la bden bshams pa nyid la
454a1('dul ba): la zhugs so// de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas
454a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
454a3('dul ba): byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong bzhin du'o// de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas/ lan gsum du ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag cag la 'di skad lta bu ni mas ma bgyis//
454a4('dul ba): phas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lhas ma lugs/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ mngon gyi 'das pas ma
454a5('dul ba): lags/ dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams rus
454a6('dul ba): pa'i ri bos las ni sgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye nas/ bdag cag lha dang / lha dang mi rnams ni bkod de/ btsun pa bdag
454a7('dul ba): cag 'phag so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
454a8('dul ba): kyis bdag dge snyen du bzung du gsol/ de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
454b1('dul ba): skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag cag cung zad cig stsol cig dang / de la bdag cag bgyi ba dag bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
454b2('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyis dbuskra dang sen mo bregs te byin te byin no// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / se mo'i mchod rten zhig rtsigs te/ de nas rgyal bu
454b3('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i gang yin pa des/ mchod rten 'khor sar pa ku la'i yal ga de skyed de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
454b4('dul ba): bdag ni mchod rten 'di bgyi ba bgyid cing mchiso// zhes de de nyid na gnas so// kha cig gi ni yugs sa me'i mchod rten no// zhes bya bar rab tu shes/ kha cig/
454b5('dul ba): gi ni ba ku la'i 'khor sa la zhes bya bar shes te/ mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i dge slong dag/ da dung yang phyag byed do// bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang /
454b6('dul ba): ji tsam na bsti gnas gzhan zhig na/ drang srong lnga brgya gnas te/ de dag bsti gnas de me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pas de dag des
454b7('dul ba): rgyags nas ji yang mi sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dus la gzigs nas/ sti gnas der gshegs te phyin nas/
454b8('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyis sti gnas der me tog dang / 'bras bu ni blags chu ni skams ne'u gsing rnams ni blog/ 'dug gnas dag ni tib po// de nas drang srong de dag
455a1('dul ba): lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ sems khongasu chud cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
455a2('dul ba): ci'i phyir sems khongasu chud cing 'dag/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi zhing rkang pa gnyis khyod 'dir gshegs na/ bdag cag
455a3('dul ba): ni gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong dag sti gnas de'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang chu phun sum tshogs
455a4('dul ba): pa ci ste ma rung / ci sngon gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du bya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phral rtul ba dang / mngon
455a5('dul ba): gyi ji bzhin du gyur nas chos bshad pa mdzad do// de nas de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par skyed dam/
455a6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun
455a7('dul ba): pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// de thos nas de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ bcom ldan
455a8('dul ba): 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
455b1('dul ba): 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po lta na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// /
455b2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas/ dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyad cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
455b3('dul ba): pa'i mod la/ skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang / skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa dang / dge slong bstan
455b4('dul ba): bar rdzogs nas log brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ skra byin snam sbyar gyon pa'i
455b5('dul ba): lus ldan zhing / mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur to/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus bkab par gyur// de dag gis 'bad pa dang stsol bas bcom
455b6('dul ba): 'grus brtsams pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad zhes bya ba nas mngon par smra bar
455b7('dul ba): gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de dag la 'doms par byed pa'i drang srong gang yin pa des gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis cha byad 'dis
455b8('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs skyes pa de dag ci dad pa skyes par bgyis la slad kyis rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong lnga brgya dang mngon gyi
456a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis/ zla ba kham pa lta bur skor nas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la gshegs te/ rim gyis btun
456a2('dul ba): ri la byon no// de'i tshe btun ri la drang srong shing gos can zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ drang srong des bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
456a3('dul ba): kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas/ mdzes pargyad ring po kho na nas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems
456a4('dul ba): mngon par dad par gyur te/ de dad pa skyes nas bsams pa/ ma bdag ri las babs/ bcom ldan 'das lta zhing 'gro na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la gzig
456a5('dul ba): pas/ 'das par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag nyid mchod par bya'o snyam nas/ de la ri las bdag nyid mchongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
456a6('dul ba): spel ba mi mnya' ba'i chos can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal
456a7('dul ba): dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de// de thos nas shing gos can gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas
456a8('dul ba): te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
456b1('dul ba): byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i dge slong gis dngos po thob pa lta na/ zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo /
456b2('dul ba): zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnam
456b3('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dad pas rnam par grol rnams kyis mchog ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste dge slong shing gos can 'di yin no//
456b4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong gis yongs su bskor te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing grong khyer slo ma lta bur gshegaso// bcom ldan
456b5('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te sgo cig nas zhugs gzhan dang gzhan du sems sems par 'gyur bas/ ma la nga'i rdzu 'phrul kho nas 'jug par bya'o snyam
456b6('dul ba): nas/ de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi na mkha' las grong khyer slo ma lta bu'i dbus su gshegaso// de nas slo ma lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan
456b7('dul ba): pa gang po dang / shing gi rna cha dang / rgya skyegs kyi rna cha can dang / zha de'i rna cha can dang / rgyal po'i sras bcu bdun po de dag kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang
456b8('dul ba): srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas zham
457a1('dul ba): ring byas shing tsan dan gyi 'phreng ba'i khang bzang gang na ba der gshegs te byon pas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
457a2('dul ba): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// skye bo'i tshogs chen po des bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // tsan dan gyi 'phreng ba'i khang bzangs zhig la thugs pa dang / bcwa
457a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te tsan dan gyi 'phreng ba'i khang bzangs zhig par gyur na/ sbyin bdag rnams kyi bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ ma la 'di shel
457a4('dul ba): gyi rang bzhin du sprul par bya'o// snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ji ltar skye ba'i tshogs des sangs rgyas kyi sku 'grib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur ba shel
457a5('dul ba): gyi rang bzhin tu sprul to// de nas 'khor de dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa
457a6('dul ba): mdzad de/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po dag rtogs te/ kha cig gi ni thar pa'i chad par 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/
457a7('dul ba): kha cig gis ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa/ kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
457a8('dul ba): bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas/
457b1('dul ba): kha cig gis ni nyen thos kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
457b2('dul ba): chub tu'o// 'khor der phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab dang / dge 'dun la bab par bkod de/ de nas shing gi rnam cha can dang / rgya skyegs
457b3('dul ba): kyi rna tshwa dang / zha nye'i rna cha can rnams kyis gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas/ gdan bshams te/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/
457b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyi dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshed lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/
457b5('dul ba): de'i tshe klu'i bdag po nag po dang / dge'u ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de gnyis kyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer slo ma lta bur chos 'cha
457b6('dul ba): kyis dong la mnyan par bya'o snyam mo// de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang / grong khyer slo ma lta bur chu bo lnga brgya phab nas chas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
457b7('dul ba): 'das rnams ni snyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / 'ge'u ta ma 'di gnyis gal te grong
457b8('dul ba): khyer slom lta bur 'ongs par gyur na/ yul phung par byed par 'gyur ro// snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka'
458a1('dul ba): stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rengs pa'i bsod snyoms longs shig/ me'u 'gal gyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rings pa'i
458a2('dul ba): bsod snyoms ni lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ blo bur ba dang / 'gro bar chas pa dang / nad pa dang / nad g.yog dang / dge sgos so// skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das
458a3('dul ba): dge sgos la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gis na mkha' las gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das dang mo'u 'gal gyis bu gnyis/
458a4('dul ba): klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / 'ge'u ta ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po grong khyer slo ma lta bu la soms la yul phung bar ma byed
458a5('dul ba): cig/ de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag cag gang srog chags grog spur la yang gnod par mi byed pa dang / de lta bu'i dad pa mchis nas/ slo ma lta
458a6('dul ba): bur gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po nag po dang / 'ge'u ta ma la de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdza
458a7('dul ba): de/ de thos nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu song zhing slab pa'i bzhi rnams bzung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol ba'i mdzad pa
458a8('dul ba): brtsams pa dang / klu re re nas bsams pa/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis chu'i gtung ba gsol la snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ga
458b1('dul ba): te gcig gi chu gsol na ni des na gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sems par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
458b2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po song la gang na chu lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chu lhung bzed khong la khyer te shog shig
458b3('dul ba): btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pas/ gang du chu bo lnga brgya 'das pa de nas chu lhung bzed
458b4('dul ba): dkang nas khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkang ba'i chu phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/
458b5('dul ba): gsol lo// tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag pa dang mas ni bu gsos srid/
458b6('dul ba): skyed nu mas nun/ 'dzam bu gling sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin pas/ shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/ bus phrag pa gcig na ni ma bzhag/ gcig shos la ni pha
458b7('dul ba): bzhag nas/ lo brgya tshang bar khur du thogs sam/ sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang /
458b8('dul ba): spug dang / pad+ma ra ka dang / dang ga ya su 'khyil ba dang / de lta bu'i dbang phyug la bdag po bcug kyang / bus pha ma la des tsam gyis phan thogs pa 'am/ lan
459a1('dul ba): lon par mi 'gyur gyis/ gang gi pha ma la dad pa med pa/ dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la/ 'dul zhing 'jud de
459a2('dul ba): so sor 'god par byed pa dang / tshul khrims 'tshal pa/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang / ser sna can gtod sa pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / shes rab 'chal
459a3('dul ba): pa shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de so sor 'god par byed de/ de tsam ni bus pa ma la phan 'dogs pa dang / lan
459a4('dul ba): lon pa yin no zhes gsungs na bdag gis ni ma la lan ci yang ma lon gyis/ ma la bdag gis ma gang du skyes bsam mo snyam nas/ bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /
459a5('dul ba): 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong ngo // de de'i des su'i gdul bya yin pa rtags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yin par mthong nas/ de/ snyam du
459a6('dul ba): sems te/ bdag lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs pas/ ci nas kyang bdag gi bcom ldan 'das la don 'di gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
459a7('dul ba): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon dge slong dag pa dang mas bu la shin tu dga' byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gi ma ni 'jig rten gyi khams
459a8('dul ba): 'od zer can du skyes te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ 'dul bar gsol/
459b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dod // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'o// des bcom ldan 'das dang /
459b2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dang me'u 'gal gyis bu chen po ri rab kyi rtse la gom pa bor zhing gshegs pa dang / zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du byon to//
459b3('dul ba): bu mo bzang mos tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rgyad ring po kho na nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ kye ma'o/
459b4('dul ba): yun ring zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo // kye ma'o yun ring mo ring mo zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo // de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba
459b5('dul ba): 'di ni rgan na/ ji ltar bu mo 'di ni de'i ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i lus 'di 'dis bskyed do/ des na kho
459b6('dul ba): bo'i ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun 'phags
459b7('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de thos nas bu mo bzang mo des 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi
459b8('dul ba): rdo rjes bcom ldanas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do zhes bya ba
460a1('dul ba): nas/ lha dang mi rnams rab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang po dang / ldan pa
460a2('dul ba): mi bzod pa'i ngan song lam ni khyod kyi mthus bcad de// mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan byed/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// khyod
460a3('dul ba): la rten nas shin tu rnam dag mig gnyis dang bral bas dag pa deng mthor thob/ 'phags pa dges pa'i go 'phangs zhi thob nas/ sdug bsngal ba rgya mtsho'i pha rol
460a4('dul ba): bdag gis rgal// 'gro ba lha min lha dang mis mchod pa// skye rgas tshe dang nad dang rnam bral ba srid pa stong du mthong ba brnyed dka' ba// thub khyod mthong deng 'dir 'dra/
460a5('dul ba): bu bcas// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags shing mngon par 'phags te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi lags kyis/ dge bsnyen du
460a6('dul ba): gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tshe'i bar du bsam pa thag pas skyabasu mchi bar mngon par kro lagaso// bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang
460a7('dul ba): thabs gcig tu deng bsod snyoms sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de la cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo //
460a8('dul ba): des bu mo bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan 'das pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po gdan la
460b1('dul ba): bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang shing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshis par de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing gsod pa'i
460b2('dul ba): bza' ba dang / bza' ba rang gi lag nas skabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag gnyis pa bcas te lhung bzed khru bar
460b3('dul ba): rig nas/ stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar gting nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
460b4('dul ba): bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos blangs te/ lhung bzed khru bar byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
460b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po mdong // bcom ldan 'das gshegaso// su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'o// gal te de lta na rgyal
460b6('dul ba): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgo soms shig/ bcom ldan 'das 'o skol byon lags sam/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yu bu phyin zin to// de nas ngo mtshar du dad pa'i yid
460b7('dul ba): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu yid 'gyogs yin no// btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo de
460b8('dul ba): la kun bdag gi tho bar ma chud do// gal te bdag gis glo bar chud par gyur na/ bdag gi lus til gyi bye ma ltar bgyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par
461a1('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis sems las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni shing tshig pa bzhin ci bgyir yang ma mchis lag so// /
461a2('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las ci zhig bgyis
461a3('dul ba): na/ de las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skyes pa lags/ las ci zhig bgyis nas bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab
461a4('dul ba): tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang po
461a5('dul ba): nyid kyi las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su sbyar ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing / bsags pas/ gang pos
461a6('dul ba): las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin
461a7('dul ba): par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi ma 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la ma 'gyur gyis/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing /
461a8('dul ba): bsag pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khas dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnam brgal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus/
461b1('dul ba): rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi shu khri thub pa na/ ston pa de/
461b2('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
461b3('dul ba): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer ba na ra ser nye
461b4('dul ba): bar rten cing bzhug so// de'i bstan pa la ni 'di rab tu byung nas/ sde snod gsum par byed par gyur te/ chos bzhin gyi dge 'dun gyis zhal 'byed do// re shig
461b5('dul ba): dgra bcom pa zhig la dge skos bab ste/ des gtsug lag khang du phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang / rlung langs phyag dar phan tshun du khyer bar gyur to// des
461b6('dul ba): bsams pa/ re shig rlung de zhi bar gyur gyi bar du bzhag go/ snyam pa las ji tsam na gtsug lag khang de ma phyags pa zhal ta pa des mthong nas/ de kun nas bkris
461b7('dul ba): ba drag pos dag brtsam po'i las byung ba bran mo'i bu gang zhig dge skos byed/ dgra bcom pa des mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ 'di kun nas bkris
461b8('dul ba): pa yin pas/ re shig bzhag la phyis go bar bya'o snyam nas/ gang gis che kun nas bkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe drung du song ste smras pa/ khyod kyis kho bo
462a1('dul ba): su yin shes sam/ des smras pa/ shes te khyod dang kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab
462a2('dul ba): tu byung ba yin no// des smras pa/ gal te de lta yin mod kyis kho bos ni rab tu byung ba'i bya ba byas te/ kho bo ni mching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la/
462a3('dul ba): khyod ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin pas/ khyod kyis dag rtsub po'i las phyung gis nyes pa la nyes par bshags shig/ des na las de srabs
462a4('dul ba): pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyuraro// des nyes pa la nyes par bshags pas/ sems can dmyal bar skyes shing bran mo'i bur 'gyur
462a5('dul ba): ba las/ de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes par/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te/ da ltar gyi bar du srid pa tha ma pa la yang blan mo'i mngal
462a6('dul ba): du skyes par gyur to// gang yang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skyes so// gang yang de na slabs shing bton
462a7('dul ba): bas phung po la mkhas dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas te/ des na de'i bstan
462a8('dul ba): pa la rab byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kying rnam
462b1('dul ba): bar smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin no// 'dres pa rnams kyi ni 'dres ma yin no// dge slong dag de
462b2('dul ba): lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang / 'dres ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba la stsal bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de lta bu la slab/
462b3('dul ba): par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// gleng
462b4('dul ba): bzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o// de'i rgyal po'i khab na klu'i rgyal po grogs 'khor ba dang / ri bo gnas so// de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu brgya yang rtag tu 'bab
462b5('dul ba): la/ chu mig dang mtshe dang tshi'u rnams kyang skam par mi 'gyur/ lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas/ lo tog rnams kyang lhag par legs pa
462b6('dul ba): 'gyur ro// gang+gA tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga'o dang nye dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba na/ de gnyis ri rab kyi bang rI nas nyi ma re re zhing
462b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal grog 'khor dang ri bo gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ klu'i rgyal po dga'o dang nyer dga' bo
462b8('dul ba): 'di gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na/ bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
463a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni/ bzang po ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen
463a2('dul ba): bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang nas ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
463a3('dul ba): cig tu 'dug go/ phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la
463a4('dul ba): skyabs su dong zhing chos dang dge 'dug la skyabs su dong nas/ bslab pa'i bzhi rnams spangs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / slab pa'i
463a5('dul ba): gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
463a6('dul ba): kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu mchis shing slab pa'i
463a7('dul ba): bzhi rnams mnos pa de'i tshe/ lus dang longs spyod legs par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu gnang na/ bdag cag
463a8('dul ba): rgya mtsho ches pos 'dug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po dag khyod rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa yin gyis rgyal po la rtogs
463b1('dul ba): shig/ de gnyis kyis bsams pa dang / don gyis ni bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu mi snang ngo // zhes smras na/ klu'i rgyal po grog po 'khar dang / ri be'i kun tu
463b2('dul ba): spyod pa ni/ gal te nub ma bcom ldan 'das ltar 'gro na ni/ lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis so// 'on te nyin par ni khyim bdag gi cha byad kyis so// de gnyis khyim bdag
463b3('dul ba): gis cha byad du byas shing / nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do// rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun tu spyod
463b4('dul ba): pa ni/ de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das lta bar 'gro bar de'i tshe/ dga' zhing bdag mthong na ldang bar mi byed pa grang zhes mi gnang chen gtang byed de/ des mi ga nang chen
463b5('dul ba): zhig mngag ste/ kye nang rjes song la/ bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen byed ltos shig/ de song ba las ji tsam na khyim bdag gnyis shig mthong nas des bsam
463b6('dul ba): pa/ 'di gnyis ni lha'i yul na gnas pas ci'i phyir ldang bar byed mi byed snyam nas/ rgyal pos smras pa/ lha khyim bdag gnyis mchis pa ni yul nyid na// gnas
463b7('dul ba): pa lags so// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsams pa/ de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na/ ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed kyis 'gro'o snyam na/ de nas bcom
463b8('dul ba): ldan 'das gad na ba der song ba dang / klu'i rgyal po grogs mkhar dang / ri 'os rgyal po gzugs can snying po mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di
464a1('dul ba): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchis na ci re shig rgyal po la bsti stang bgyi 'am/ 'on te chos
464a2('dul ba): la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po dag chos la bsti stang byos shog/ dam pa'i chos la ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
464a3('dul ba): 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed la/ chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyang bla mar byed do// tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin
464a4('dul ba): dang // da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin dang // ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin dang // mang po'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad pa// bzhud dang bzhags dang byon gyur pa/
464a5('dul ba): thams cad chos la bla mar byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// de bas 'dir bdag phan 'dod pa// bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa dong ngo // bdag gi
464a6('dul ba): yul ma rung bar gyur lags so// rgyal po chen po de gnyis la bzod pa byin cig dang // ma rungs par mi 'gyur ro// de gnyis rgyal mtsho chen po
464a7('dul ba): mchis na// ji ltar bzod pa stsal// de gnyis tshe brgyad dang // bcu bzhi lnga bdag gis cha byad du byas nas// nga'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal
464a8('dul ba): du 'ongs pa dang // ngas rtags bstan gyis bzod pa byin cig/ bcom ldan 'das ci bdag gis rkang pa gnyis la btugs par bgyi 'am/ rkang pa
464b1('dul ba): gnyis la btugs par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang lag pa rkyong la klu'i rgyal po bzod par gsol zhes smros shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos de
464b2('dul ba): gnyis 'ongs pa la 'bad do sdod ci 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na gnyis khyim bdag gis cha byad du byas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs
464b3('dul ba): ba dang / de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bstan pa dang / rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyang nas smras pa/
464b4('dul ba): klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par gsol lo// rgyal po chen po bzod par bgyi'o// gal te bzod par gyur na 'dir spyon cig/ rgyal po chen
464b5('dul ba): po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag gis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas/ de nyid kyi tshe bdag cag gi lus dang
464b6('dul ba): longs spyod skyes te/ gal te de che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na yul ma ga d+ha ra yang mi shong bar 'gyur ro// 'o na yul ma ga d+ha ra ma rung bar 'gyur mod/
464b7('dul ba): ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar mi 'gyur/ khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang bzangs gnyis rtsigs la zla ba drug gi dus tshod gyis shig dang / kho bo
464b8('dul ba): cag gi 'khor zhag la dus chod kyi tshe yang 'du bar bya'o// rgyal pos de bzhin du byas pa dang / de gnyis kyi 'khor kyang bzhag la/ dus mchod kyang rang nyid
465a1('dul ba): nyams su myong bar byed do// ji tsam dus mchod gzhan zhig na de dag gi 'khor dag med par gnas par/ klu gdug pa
465a2('dul ba): dag gis grags rnyed nas/ de dag gis ser ba dbab par brtsams pa dang / rgyal po'i khab du bram ze ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod do//
465a3('dul ba): des de bab cing bab pa dag bcad pa dang / de la yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skyes pa'i tshogs kyis dbang thang byin no// lho phyogs na bram ze mes sbyin zhes bya
465a4('dul ba): ba/ ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa zhes bya zhig yod pa de dang / byang phyogs na yul nus pa can zhes bya ba/ zhig yod do// de na rgyal po sde mchog
465a5('dul ba): ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du bcug go/ de'i yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yod do// de na sman pa mthu che ba/ pha rol mnon pa' zhig yod par zos
465a6('dul ba): nas/ de'i ched du 'gro'o zhes chas te/ rims kyis rgyal po'i khab du phyin nas/ bram ze ser ba'i sngags 'chang ba'i gnas su zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na ser
465a7('dul ba): ba chen po 'bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des/ bcad par ma nus nas/ de phyir byung nas/ nang du zhugs par byed pa dang / bram ze mes sbyin gyis dris
465a8('dul ba): pa/ mkhan po ci'i slad du/ 'di phyir byung nas nang du zhugs par mdzad/ des smras pa/ bu ser ba chen po bab pa bcad par ma nus pas mod// bdag gis
465b1('dul ba): dgum mo// bu legs so// des chung nyung zhig la bzlas te/ gtor bas tshal pa brgyar gyis so// brgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnam
465b2('dul ba): mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur na// rngan pa thogs te/ bram ze'i khyim du dong nas smras pa/ mkhan po rgyal po'i khab kyi/ skye bo'i tshogs mngon par dga' bar gyur
465b3('dul ba): gyis/ rngan pa longs shig/ ci'i phyir/ khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa/ de'i slad du'o// des smras pa/ kho bos ni ma bcad de// tshe bya chu 'das
465b4('dul ba): de dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas/ bram ze'i khye'u nyid du 'dug shig dang / dbang thang sbyin no// de bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes de gnas so//
465b5('dul ba): des ser ba de dus za gi tsam zhig sngags btab ste/ mi 'bab par gyur to// rgyal po'i khab bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams
465b6('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis ser ba mi 'bab na/ ci'i phyir de la dbang zang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis
465b7('dul ba): gcad do// bram ze des sngags brtul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang / phyir yang ser po 'bab par
465b8('dul ba): gyur to// de rnams bram ze de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ mkhan po bram ze'i khye'u de gar mchis/ des smras pa/
466a1('dul ba): khyed cag gis de la bkur sti ma byas pas de song ngo // mkhan po gal te/
466a2('dul ba): mchis na/ bdag cag la ston cig/ de bzhin du bya'o// ye d+harma he du pra b+hA wa/ he dun+te te Shan+da
466a3('dul ba): tA thA ga to// h+ya wa dad ta/ te 'khyAn tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA ti/ ma hA shA ma Na/
466a4('dul ba): oM su pra triSh+Tha badz+ra ye swA hA/
466a5('dul ba): can thos chen po ming chen lan mo// nyon thos char po bzang po lan mo//
466a6('dul ba): na thos chen po ming chen la na ma @/ can thos chen po babang po la na ma
